document_data.name: Tathlin
document_data.mainbody: '''Tathlin''' was the eponymous owner of [[Tathlin's Discreet Errands]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, [[Ruthgul]], a thief of [[Suzail]], sought aid from one of his apprentices, the thief and dancer [[Amarune Whitewave]], after climbing through her window. He needed help escaping from someone, so she showed him to a hidden crawlspace that would let him find his way to [[Tathlin's Discreet Errands]], but warned him that Tathlin might charge him a [[Golden lion (coin)|gold lion]] for a proper disguise.
